data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
rw succ_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm b,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with i hi,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hi,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with w hw,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
repeat {rw mul_succ},
rw hw,
rw mul_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with w hw,
rw mul_zero,
simp,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
repeat {rw mul_succ},
rw add_right_comm,
rw hw,
repeat {rw add_succ},
rw succ_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with w hw,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hw,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_right_comm,
simp,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with w hw,
rw zero_mul,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw succ_mul,
rw mul_succ,
rw hw,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw ←mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm a,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
simp,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with w hw,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hw,
simp,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with w hw,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw hw,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with w hw,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
refl,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw hw,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm (b ^ w) (a * b),
rw mul_assoc a b (b ^ w),
rw mul_comm b (b ^ w),
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with w hw,
rw mul_zero,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw pow_add,
rw pow_succ,
rw hw,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
ring,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq,
intro p,
apply pqr,
exact p,
exact pq(p),

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pq qf p,
apply qf,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pq qe p,
apply qe,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intros p q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro f,
intro h,
intro p,
apply f,
exact p,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hq,
intro p,
apply hq,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText: cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr,
cases hpq with p q,
cases hqr with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros peq qer,
cases peq with pq qp,
cases qer with qr rq,
split,
intro p,
apply qr,
apply pq,
exact p,
intro r,
apply qp,
apply rq,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros peq qer,
cases peq with pq qp,
cases qer with qr rq,
split,
intro p,
apply qr,
apply pq,
exact p,
intro r,
apply qp,
apply rq,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with p qr,
cases qr with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro h,
cases h with pq qr,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact p,
left,
exact q,
cases qr with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
exfalso,
cases h with p np,
apply np,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases q : Q,
by_cases p : P,
intros h p,
exact q,
intros h p,
exact q,
intros h p,
exfalso,
apply h,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
exact hs,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
apply succ_inj,
induction t with w hw,
repeat {rw add_zero at h},
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
exact h,
apply hw,
repeat {rw add_succ at h},
have q := succ_inj h,
exact q,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw [add_comm t a, add_comm t b] at h,
exact add_right_cancel a t b h,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
apply add_right_cancel,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
exact add_left_cancel a b 0 h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ at H,
exfalso,
apply succ_ne_zero (a+d),
exact H,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw add_comm a b at h,
exact add_left_eq_zero h,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact succ_eq_add_one d,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with w hw,
exact zero_ne_succ 0,
intro h,
rw succ_eq_succ_iff w (succ w) at h,
apply hw,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros ha hb,
intro hab,
cases b with i,
apply hb,
refl,
rw mul_succ at hab,
apply ha,
cases a with j,
refl,
rw add_succ at hab,
exfalso,
exact succ_ne_zero _ hab,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a,
left,
refl,
cases b,
right,
refl,
exfalso,
rw mul_succ at h,
rw add_succ at h,
exact succ_ne_zero _ h,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
exact eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b h,
intro hab,
cases hab,
rw hab,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw hab,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff,
intro h,
cases h,
exfalso,
apply ha,
exact h,
exact h,
intro hb,
cases b,
rw mul_zero at hb,
symmetry at hb,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at hb,
cases hb,
exfalso,
apply ha,
exact hb,
symmetry,
exact hb,
rw succ_eq_succ_iff,
rw [mul_succ, mul_succ, add_right_cancel_iff] at hb,
have hdb := hd b,
apply hdb,
exact hb,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
ring,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
use 0,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw le_iff_exists_add at h ⊢,
cases h with c hc,
rw hc,
use succ c,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use a,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
cases hab with c hc,
cases hbc with d hd,
rw hc at hd,
use (c+d),
rw ←add_assoc,
exact hd,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with c hc,
cases hba with d hd,
rw hc at hd,
rw add_assoc at hd,
symmetry at hd,
have h := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hd,
have h1 := add_right_eq_zero h,
rw h1 at hc,
rw hc,
exact add_zero a,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
symmetry at hc,
exact add_right_eq_zero hc,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
use c,
rw hc,
rw succ_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
revert a,
induction b with d hd,
intro a,
right,
exact zero_le a,
intro a,
cases a with a,
left,
exact zero_le _,
cases hd a,
left,
exact succ_le_succ a d h,
right,
exact succ_le_succ d a h,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
use 1,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
intro t,
use c,
rw hc,
ring,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
use c,
apply succ_inj,
rw hc,
exact succ_add a c,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
induction a with d hd,
rw succ_add at hc,
exact zero_ne_succ _ hc,
rw succ_add at hc,
apply hd,
apply succ_inj,
exact hc,

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
use c,
rw hc,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with l r,
cases l with c hc,
cases c with d,
  exfalso,
  rw add_zero at hc,
  apply r,
  rw hc,
  refl,
use d,
rw hc,
rw succ_add,
rw add_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
split,
  apply le_trans a (succ a) b,
  exact le_succ_self a,
  exact h,
intro nh,
apply ne_succ_self,
apply le_antisymm a (succ a),
exact le_succ_self a,
exact le_trans (succ a) b a h nh,

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact lt_aux_one a b,
exact lt_aux_two a b,
